short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share Claude conversations as text files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ClaudeShare - Export your Claude AI conversations into easily readable text files. This extension adds a convenient share button next to Claude's upload button, allowing you to save entire conversations including both human and AI responses, while preserving formatting like numbered lists and bullet points. Perfect for archiving important conversations, sharing insights, or keeping records of your interactions with Claude.
